banner.title: branding
banner.heading: branding
banner.description: Your brand is how your consumers feel about you, It’s an emotion and experience intertwined. Creating emotions is intricate work, and we accomplish this with a focus on rich/loud storytelling, relevancy and meaning. We go beyond face value, identify your brand DNA and clarify core values to magnify what you stand for to give your brand a recognizable face that is relevant, articulate and stunning!  From strategy to inception, we launch visions backed by powerful designs to build brands that are seen, felt and heard. From reimagination to developing one from scratch, we build fresh and visually-dynamic brands on the backbone of data-driven strategies that stand the test of time and trends

pageContent.heading: Logo Design
pageContent.description: May the best logo win. A spearhead in your branding and marketing efforts, a good logo is distinct, memorable and unique. We make sure that your brand essence is conveyed effectively and clearly with beautiful logo designs that draw your target audience in. On the backbone of your brand strategy, we create well-designed and visually engaging logos that make your business easily recognized at every touchpoint.

pageContent.heading: Visual Identity
pageContent.description: We bring fresh brand concepts to life by giving your brand a recognizable face. The mob will research your market, analyze your business and decode your unique positioning to activate your core values and build a comprehensive visual identity system. From typography and color palette to logo and brand imagery, your brand message and voice is unified with all the essential creative/design building blocks your brand needs for the/a perfect/great first impression

pageContent.heading: Brand Strategy
pageContent.description: Your business has to become more than just stunning visuals, products, services or words, and that’s why branding at Loud Mob Media begins with a clear brand strategy. Going beyond your face value, a strategy is a powerful competitive weapon that allows us to translate bold ideas into coherent brand roadmaps that align with your business goals. Your brand meaning and message is defined, competitive landscape analysed, brand awareness strategies clarified, brand voice and personality crafted and unique market opportunities identified.

pageContent.heading: Packaging
pageContent.description: Winning the retail wars is not an easy feat and a stunning visual identity is just the beginning. Your packaging is a crucial communication tool in your all-encompassing branding efforts. We design attractive packaging that grabs eyeballs in the cutthroat online and offline retail landscape. We love doing innovative packaging that breaks through the clutter and creates brand recognition

pageContent.heading: Brand Reimagination
pageContent.description: Brands need to keep up with change or risk becoming irrelevant in this digital era. Invigorating designs, re-envisioned strategies and future-ready repositioning take your core values and put it to work in new and improved ways. At Loud Mob Media, an effective brand reimagination will authentically elevate what is already known and believed about your brand to add new reasons that build renewed trust and connect with your target audience.
